nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_eimp_ionzation_rate_coefs¶

Extract electron impact ionization cross sections and compute rate coefs

This in not intended to be run by users and is included here for documentation.

References

Na: Johnston et al. (1995) O, S: CHIANTI

Attributes¶

temperature

ion_unit

spec

Functions¶

crosssection_to_rate(temperature, energy, sigma)

Convolve the electron impact ionization cross sections with

save_rates(species)

Save the electron impact cross sections and rate coefficients

Module Contents¶

nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_eimp_ionzation_rate_coefs.temperature¶
nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_eimp_ionzation_rate_coefs.ion_unit = None¶
nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_eimp_ionzation_rate_coefs.crosssection_to_rate(temperature, energy, sigma)¶

Convolve the electron impact ionization cross sections with a Maxwellial flux distribution function

see Electron Impact Ionization for more details.

Parameters:
temperature: astropy Quantity array

Electron temperatures at which rate coefficient will be calculated

energy: astropy Quantity array

Energies at which cross sections have been measured or computed

sigma: astropy Quantity array

Electron impact ionization cross section as function of energy

Returns:
Electron impact ionization coefficient as function of electron temperature
nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_eimp_ionzation_rate_coefs.save_rates(species)¶

Save the electron impact cross sections and rate coefficients

Parameters:
speciesstr
Returns:
Nothing, but saves a dict with cross sections (sigma), energies at
which cross sections were measured (E_sigma), electron temperature
(T_e), and electron impact ionization rate coefficient as function of
electron temperature (kappa)
nexoclom2.atomicdata.load_eimp_ionzation_rate_coefs.spec¶
